rmi

Interface SiteAdministration

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SiteAdministrationImpl

    public interface SiteAdministration
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Represent a objet on each computer to manage the number of site by computer.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void decrement()
      decrement the number of site
      int getNumberOfSites()
      return the number of site
      void increment()
      increment the number of site
